com.netflix.spectator.tdigest

Class TDigestDistributionSummary

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.spectator.tdigest.TDigestDistributionSummary
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.netflix.spectator.api.DistributionSummary, com.netflix.spectator.api.Meter, TDigestMeter

    public class TDigestDistributionSummary
extends Object
implements TDigestMeter, com.netflix.spectator.api.DistributionSummary
    Timer that updates a T-Digest with recorded values.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Return a percentile from the last complete digest.

    • Method Detail

      • record

        public void record(long amount)
        Description copied from interface: com.netflix.spectator.api.DistributionSummary
        Updates the statistics kept by the summary with the specified amount.
        Specified by:
        record in interface com.netflix.spectator.api.DistributionSummary
        Parameters:
        amount - Amount for an event being measured. For example, if the size in bytes of responses from a server. If the amount is less than 0 the value will be dropped.

      • percentile

        public double percentile(double p)
        Return a percentile from the last complete digest.
        Parameters:
        p - Percentile to retrieve. The value should be in the interval [0.0, 100.0].
        Returns:
        The pth percentile of the last complete digest.
